hymn.title: Friends
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—Making Friends

layout.singingstanza: What do you do when your friends say, “Let's do” some -- thing you know you real -- ly should -- n't? That's the time to walk a -- way and part com -- pa -- ny. Part com -- pa -- ny, part com -- pa -- ny, That's the time to walk a -- way and part com -- pa -- ny.

lyrics.stanza: What do you do when your friends say, "Let's do" something you know you really shouldn't? That's the time to walk away and part company. Part company, part company, That's the time to walk away and part company.

We don't need those kinds of friends And we don't need to be with them; They'll only hurt us in the end, they're bad company. Bad company, bad company, Don't be afraid to say, "Goodbye" to bad company.

What kind of friends then should we play with, Have overnight, or spend the day with? Those who are going the right way; they're good company. Good company, good company, Those who are going the right way are good company.
